actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of the Fairport National Fish Hatchery to the State of Iowa to be used by the Iowa Conservation Commission.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer the Fairport National Fish Hatchery to the State of Iowa to be used by the Iowa Conservation Commission.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of the Fairport National Fish Hatchery to the State of Iowa to be used by the Iowa Conservation Commission.
